duties_responsibilities.duty: Sustain and grow the radiology imaging business through education and relationship-building with physicians, patients, and peers across the region.
Lead short-term and long-range planning and business development activities in collaboration with regional and partner company leadership.
Manage the P&L, perform budget reviews, and develop action plans to address variances.
Identify growth plan development and stand-up of De Novo centers, and manage book of business by forecasting budgets and identifying trends that impact the overall business.
Collaborate with commercial teams to align and implement strategic business goals, and create consistent communication cascades of business activities and successes.
Develop and maintain partnerships with centralized services to streamline operations, and build and maintain relationships with referring physicians and joint venture partnerships.
Develop, mentor, and coach center managers, build relationships with the team, and foster a positive culture.
Lead training sessions for center teams, build formal development and succession plans, oversee talent pipeline, and lead regular team meetings and employee one-on-ones.
Lead, initiate, and participate in annual performance evaluations, development, and performance management of associates, and support employees to ensure the highest level of patient satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Healthcare Management, Business Administration, or related field (Master's preferred)
